replies.bodyText:
Since this file was added in 2019, I added the 2019 year - https://github.com/opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security/commits/master/src/main/java/com/amazon/opendistroforelasticsearch/security/dlic/rest/api/TenantsApiAction.java.
We probably need to figure this out for a lot of files that have been present for sometime in our codebase.
